documents.title: getting-started
documents.content: Welcome to our documentation! This guide will help you get started with our platform. This is the documentation for version 2.0. If you're using version 1.0, please click here . Prerequisites Node.js 18 or higher npm, yarn, or pnpm Basic knowledge of JavaScript Installation You can install our package using npm: npm install @our-package/core@2.0.0 Or using yarn: yarn add @our-package/core@2.0.0 Or using pnpm: pnpm add @our-package/core@2.0.0 Basic Usage Here's a simple example of how to use our package: {`import { createApp } from '@our-package/core'; // New in v2: Async/await support async function initializeApp() { const app = await createApp({ // Configuration options debug: true, mode: 'development', // New in v2: Enhanced options plugins: ['logger', 'analytics'], performance: { monitoring: true, metrics: ['cpu', 'memory'] } }); await app.start(); } initializeApp();`} New Features in v2 Full async/await support Enhanced plugin system Performance monitoring Improved error handling TypeScript type definitions included Next Steps Now that you have the basics set up, you can: Learn more about configuration options Explore the API reference Check out some examples Read about migrating from v1
